name: 8Gauge: Shotgun Shells and War Crimes
description:
Years after the war you fight insurgents in old bunkers.  You are to protect Andossia and the fragile peace.

8Gauge is a brutal, high octane shooter. Standing still is a sure way to death. You have one gun. But You have dozens of different ammo types: grenades, buckshot, piercing rounds...  8Gauge comes with a custom level editor.

Discord: https://discord.gg/tv3DcsDeAM (to share custom map codes)

Works on Linux with Wine (Turn off shaders)
